title: Gmail API Get Specified Thread Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the Get Specified Thread operation in Gmail API

payload.description: A collection of messages representing a conversation.

historyId.description: The ID of the last history record that modified this thread.

id.description: The unique ID of the thread.

messages.description: The list of messages in the thread.

snippet.description: A short part of the message text.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
